DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess pharmacokinetic parameter intravenous diclofenac sodium ( DIC075V ) 18.75 mg 37.5 mg follow single- multiple-dose administration , compare oral diclofenac potassium ( Cataflam® 50 mg ) , approve reference product .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Pharmacokinetics IV Diclofenac Sodium ( 2 Doses ) Versus Oral Diclofenac Potassium
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , three-treatment , six sequence , three-period , single center crossover study evaluate pharmacokinetics intravenous diclofenac sodium DIC075V ( 18.75 mg 37.5 mg ) versus oral diclofenac potassium ( Cataflam® 50 mg ) healthy adult volunteer follow single- multiple-dose administration . Each treatment sequence receive 1 dose every 6 hour ( total 4 dos per treatment sequence ) 48-hour washout period treatment sequence .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer 18 55 year age . Smoked used tobacco nicotine product past six month expect study . Known allergy hypersensitivity diclofenac , aspirin , NSAIDs . History previous and/or present peptic ulceration , GI bleed bleed diathesis , positive hepatitis B hepatitis C HIV antibody , history asthma .
